definition: blank/blank space on a form/space/囗 (indicating missing or illegible character)
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: Avoid hard-coding blank spaces or tabs at the end of a line of sample code.
sentences.chinese: 要避免在示例代码行的结尾用硬编码空格或制表符。

sentences.english: Having data sets with a non-white space character separating the data points is a very common occurrence.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的就是数据集合不使用空格字符分隔数据点。

sentences.english: This field is blank padded and is not null terminated.
sentences.chinese: 该字段用空格填充，且不以空字符结尾。

sentences.english: Q. What effect do tabs, spaces, and new lines have on the program?
sentences.chinese: 制表位，空格和换行符对程序有什么影响？

sentences.english: Using spaces to line up code adds to the size.
sentences.chinese: 使用空格来排列代码让文件尺寸增加。

sentences.english: Replace sequences of white-space within the string with a single space.
sentences.chinese: 在字符串内使用单空格替换连续的空白。

sentences.english: That means a single added or removed space will invalidate the signature.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着添加或者移除一个空格将会使签名无效。

sentences.english: In that corner, I drew a three generations family, presenting two generations of mothers.
sentences.chinese: 我后来就在这空格里画上祖孙三代，代表两代的母亲。

sentences.english: Enter a space if you want a value to be null.
sentences.chinese: 如果您想要一个值为空，可以输入一个空格。

sentences.english: The enclosed statements should be indented four more spaces.
sentences.chinese: 被括起的语句必须多缩进四个空格。

sentences.english: Ensure that there are no nulls embedded at the end of the file.
sentences.chinese: 确保文件最后没有嵌入空格。

sentences.english: why not just insert a space as a literal?
sentences.chinese: 为什么不直接插入一个空格字符？

sentences.english: You should use two spaces after a sentence-ending period.
sentences.chinese: 应该在句尾的句号后边加上两个空格。

sentences.english: The body itself is indented four spaces.
sentences.chinese: 函数程序体应缩进四个空格。

sentences.english: You may use a distrbuted whiteout to correct the answer sheet.
sentences.chinese: 答题纸上的每一个空格都要用笔清楚的涂满。

definition: Chinese back-sloping comma 、 (punct. used to separate items in a list)
